ygData.subject: Re: Oh it's a 2hr uptime estimate! DOH..they can't even get that right!
ygData.msgSnippet: i like those with magic creatures DragonStar PhoenixStar SerpentStar PegaStar WolfStar and then there are those from fantasy novels Snowlock (for those elves
ygData.messageBody:
i like those with magic creatures
DragonStar
PhoenixStar
SerpentStar
PegaStar
WolfStar

and then there are those from fantasy novels
Snowlock (for those elves with the character face with that white lock)
Stormbringer (michael moorcock's Elric saga)
Deathstalker (simon green's Deathstalker saga)

or you could always try some pop culture ref.

-----Original Message-----

To: SG-EverQuest <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

Subject: [sg-everquest] Oh it's a 2hr uptime estimate! DOH..they can't even get that right!
